title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Databases made effortless so agents and developers can change the world -INV208
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 让数据库变得轻松简单，使代理和开发者能够改变世界 -INV208
abstract: From startups to global enterprises, AWS Databases has been the trusted foundation powering innovative applications for nearly two decades. Join G2 Krishnamoorthy, Vice President of AWS Database Services, as he presents our mission to transform how you manage your data. Discover our vision where database management becomes effortless, delivering robust performance, seamless scale, and comprehensive security. Learn how databases integrate with AI agents and tools to reduce operational complexity while enabling a new generation of AI-native applications to advance your business capabilities. Hear from Vercel and Robinhood as they build new opportunities with AWS.
abstract_cn: 从初创企业到全球性企业，AWS 数据库近二十年来一直是支持创新应用程序的可信基础。加入 G2 Krishnamoorthy，AWS 数据库服务副总裁，聆听他介绍我们转变您数据管理方式的使命。探索我们的愿景，让数据库管理变得轻松自如，提供强大的性能、无缝扩展和全面的安全性。了解数据库如何与 AI 代理和工具集成，以降低运营复杂性，同时支持新一代 AI 原生应用程序提升您的业务能力。聆听 Vercel 和 Robinhood 如何利用 AWS 创造新机遇。
